sc.plugin2015.gui

Class GUIPluginFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • sc.plugin2015.gui.GUIPluginFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    sc.guiplugin.interfaces.IGuiPlugin, sc.plugins.IPlugin<sc.guiplugin.interfaces.IGuiPluginHost>

    public class GUIPluginFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements sc.guiplugin.interfaces.IGuiPlugin
    This is the GUIPlugin interface that is loaded by the server when it loads the plugins
    Author:
    sca
